price: 4. Quien les proporciona alimento para que no padezcan hambre y seguridad para que no teman.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
